function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The global COVID-19 pandemic poses a risk to the health and well-being of individuals worldwide, including the EU and its Member States.","Impact":"Unchecked spread of the virus can lead to increased illness, mortality, and strain on healthcare systems in affected areas.","Mitigation":"Implementing coordinated multilateral response efforts, strengthening health systems, and providing urgent humanitarian support to partner countries.","Technologies":"Health monitoring and tracking systems, vaccine development, and international cooperation platforms.","People":"Residents of the EU and its Member States, partner countries dealing with the pandemic, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"EU, Member States, global health organizations, financial institutions, and international actors."},{"Description":"The social and economic impacts of COVID-19 can have widespread effects on livelihoods and economic stability in partner countries.","Impact":"Unemployment, poverty, and economic instability can exacerbate social inequality and hinder sustainable development efforts.","Mitigation":"Supporting recovery plans, providing financial assistance, and aligning short-term responses with longer-term sustainable development goals.","Technologies":"Financial aid platforms, economic recovery tools, and sustainable development frameworks.","People":"Communities in partner countries, vulnerable populations, and policymakers.","Owner":"EU, financial institutions, international organizations, and policymakers."}]}
